国王陛下: (こくおうへいか) - His Majesty the King
国産: (こくさん) - domestic; domestically-produced; produced within a country
国産化: (こくさんか) - transition to domestic production; import substitution
国産米: (こくさんまい) - domestically produced rice
国界: (こっかい) - national border; provincial border
国破れて: (くにやぶれて) - with one's country in ruins
国税局: (こくぜいきょく) - revenue office; taxation bureau
国税庁: (こくぜいちょう) - National Tax Agency (Japan); Internal Revenue Service (USA); IRS
国立がんセンター: (こくりつがんセンター) - National Cancer Center
国立予防衛生研究所: (こくりつよぼうえいせいけんきゅうしょ) - National Institute of Health
国立公園: (こくりつこうえん) - national park
国立劇場: (こくりつげきじょう) - National Theater
国立医薬品食品衛生研究所: (こくりついやくひんしょくひんえいせいけんきゅうじょ) - National Institute of Health Sciences; NIHS
国立博物館: (こくりつはくぶつかん) - national museum
国立図書館: (こくりつとしょかん) - national library
国立国会図書館: (こくりつこっかいとしょかん) - National Diet Library
国立国語研究所: (こくりつこくごけんきゅうしょ) - National Institute for Japanese Language
国立大学: (こくりつだいがく) - national university
国立天文台: (こくりつてんもんだい) - National Astronomical Observatory of Japan
国立学校設置法: (こくりつがっこうせっちほう) - National School Establishment Law
国立歴史民族博物館: (こくりつれきしみんぞくはくぶつかん) - National museum of Japanese history
国立銀行: (こくりつぎんこう) - national bank
国章: (こくしょう) - national emblem; (national) coat of arms
国籍: (kokuseki) - nationality, citizenship; nationality (navio, avião, etc.), registration, flag
国籍喪失: (こくせきそうしつ) - loss of citizenship; denaturalization; expatriation
国籍条項: (こくせきじょうこう) - nationality clause; legislated ban on foreigners taking up public posts
国籍法: (こくせきほう) - Japanese Nationality Act
国籍留保: (こくせきりゅうほ) - reservation of Japanese nationality (procedure used with children born outside Japan)
国籍選択: (こくせきせんたく) - choice of nationality; choice of citizenship
国粋主義: (こくすいしゅぎ) - nationalism; extreme patriotism
国系: (こっけい) - country of origin; ethnicity
国絵図: (くにえず) - provincial maps of Japan (Edo period)
国緊隊: (こくきんたい) - Japan International Cooperation Agency; JICA
国者: (くにもの) - country bumpkin; someone from the same part of the country
国自慢: (くにじまん) - national or local pride; the pride of one's native place
国色無双: (こくしょくむそう) - (yoji) (a woman of) unparalleled beauty; (a woman's beauty being) matchless throughout the land
国葬: (こくそう) - state funeral; national funeral
国衙: (こくが) - provincial governor's office; provincial governorate (beginning in the late Heian period)
国衙領: (こくがりょう) - provincial governorate (beginning in the late Heian period)
国表: (くにおもて) - one's home; one's native province
国言葉: (くにことば) - national language; local dialect
国訓: (こっくん) - Japanese reading of a kanji (sometimes esp. in ref. to readings that do not correspond to the orig. Chinese meaning of the kanji)
国訳: (こくやく) - translation from a foreign language into Japanese
国詞: (くにことば) - national language; local dialect
国語: (こくご) - national language; Japanese language (often as a school subject in Japan); native Japanese words (as opposed to loanwords)
国語学: (こくごがく) - Japanese philology; Japanese linguistics
国語審議会: (こくごしんぎかい) - Japanese Language Council
国語科: (こくごか) - Japanese language (as a school subject in Japan)
国費留学生: (こくひりゅうがくせい) - government-financed or sponsored foreign student
国造: (こくぞう) - regional administrator (pre-Taika hereditary title)
国連事務局: (こくれんじむきょく) - United Nations Secretariat
国連事務総長: (こくれんじむそうちょう) - UN Secretary General
国連人権委員会: (こくれんじんけんいいんかい) - United Nations Human Rights Commission
国連人間環境会議: (こくれんにんげんかんきょうかいぎ) - United Nations Conference on the Human Environment
国連信託統治理事会: (こくれんしんたくとうちりじかい) - UN Trusteeship Council
国連児童基金: (こくれんじどうききん) - United Nations Children's Fund; UNICEF
国連公用語: (こくれんこうようご) - official languages of the UN (Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian and Spanish)
国連分担金: (こくれんぶんたんきん) - financial contributions to the UN made by member-nations
国連安保理: (こくれんあんぽり) - Security Council
国連安保理事会: (こくれんあんぽりじかい) - United Nations Security Council
国連安全保障理事会: (こくれんあんぜんほしょうりじかい) - UN Security Council
国連平和維持軍: (こくれんへいわいじぐん) - UN peacekeeping forces
国連憲章: (こくれんけんしょう) - the UN Charter
国連旗: (こくれんき) - the United Nations flag
国連本部: (こくれんほんぶ) - United Nations (UN) Headquarters
国連決議: (こくれんけつぎ) - United Nations resolution; UN resolution
